pages.title: Ancient Ankh
pages.text: The $(thing)Ancient Ankh$() is, frankly, terrifying. When you're about to die, it activates. Your health refills, the damage vanishes, and the Ankh crumbles to dust. One use, one life saved.$(br2)The Architects clearly valued life above all else. This was probably the most common artifact in the old world. We still find fragments of them everywhere.
